TitleEnglish: Marry Me, Let's Have a Baby!
SummaryEnglish: In order to make a baby, Ayano and Taika have decided to get married, having only met the day before!!
Aliases: Marry Me, Let's Have a Baby

1.TitleEnglish: Maybe I can make it with you?
1.SummaryEnglish: Taika has a history of getting dumped by his girlfriend for his impotence. He attends a marriage hunting party where he meets Ayano, a doctor who's in a hurry to make a baby, but ends up running out, remembering his traumatic past. The following day, when Taika goes to hospital for his ED treatment, not only does he find Ayano is in charge of that department, but he also discovers that his cock is getting hard!! "Doctor! Will you marry me?!" In a risky liaison with no guarantee that he'll impregnate her, they both head to the back of the hospital room...

2.TitleEnglish: I can make it when we bath together
2.SummaryEnglish: Taika and Ayano form a marriage contract to have a child within a year. Making haste, they start living together in Ayano's apartment. As Taika enjoys Ayano's homemade cooking, Ayano accidentally spills wine over his pants! She takes this opportunity to have a bath together, and they both nervously head to the bathroom...

3.TitleEnglish: I can make our first baby
3.SummaryEnglish: Taika goes celibate for three days in preparation for the day of trying for a baby. However, he's unable to keep his desires under control just from thinking about Ayano. Managing to hold back until the very night, he rushes into the apartment elevator, bumping into Ayano, who was on her way home, also with the same thing on her mind. Unable to wait any longer, the two open the front door and start making out...

4.TitleEnglish: Maybe I can make it with my colleague too?
4.SummaryEnglish: Taika was getting along well with Ayano, but alas, he's unable to go home because of torrential rain today. He has no choice but to go to a love hotel with his junior colleague, Mimi Kagamiya until the rain dies down. However, Kagamiya couldn't hold back her frustration at how she's not treated like a woman! Taika tells her he can't have a child with anyone other than Ayano, but Kagamiya persistently urges him to have a secret relationship with her...

5.TitleEnglish: I can make it even if it's put on holdâ€¦
5.SummaryEnglish: Taika can't hide his surprise as he sees Ayano in his office with a change of his clothes, likewise with Kagamiya, who is unable to look Ayano in the eyes. After getting back from work, Ayano seems to treat Taika coldly. Despite getting worried, Taika feels she is the only one for him, and does his best to restrain himself until the day of trying for a baby! Realizing he doesn't know Ayano's preferences, he decides to cook her a meal, along with giving her an oil massage to relieve her stress...

6.TitleEnglish: I can make it in the hot spring too
6.SummaryEnglish: During the medical check-up, Kagamiya finds out that Ayano is getting married in order to take over the clinic, and tells her to break up with Taika! Unknowingly, Taika asks Ayano out on a date. Although Ayano was lost in thought, she eventually recovers her smile touched by Taika's kindness. As the sun sets to mark the end of the date, Ayano invites Taika to go to the hot spring together. Despite being surprised, Taika agrees, and they both head to the hot spring...

7.TitleEnglish: Maybe I can make it from a confession?
7.SummaryEnglish: Taika was getting overloaded with work due to his company's release date drawing near. Exhausted from pulling all-nighters in a row, Taika gets up to take a breather, only to stumble. Taika heads to the rooftop, holding onto Kagamiya for support. As Taika sighs that he can't go home again today, Kagamiya reveals why Ayano wants to get married. Taika is left speechless while Kagamiya criticizes him that he is mistaking gratitude and respect for love concerning his ED treatment.

8.TitleEnglish: Until we can make it as a married couple...?!
8.SummaryEnglish: The pregnancy test came out negative! Taika is immensely disappointed, but decides to go out for some fresh air for the sake of Ayano, who was emotionally supportive of him. Then, coming across a wedding dress, Taika insists Ayano to try it on! Ecstatic from seeing Ayano in a wedding dress, Taika confesses his sincere feelings for her, as Ayano also responds in kind.
